languages.text: {n}На мгновение вам кажется, что сержант вот-вот ответит "...кто там?", после чего — почему-то вы знаете это точно — с ним случится нечто поистине ужасное. Но, сцепив челюсти, солдат отвечает вам лишь негодующим взглядом.{/n}

{n}For a brief moment, you sense that the sergeant is about to reply, "Who's there?", followed by him suffering the grisliest of fates. Somehow you know this for certain, but he just clenches his jaw and shoots you an indignant glare instead.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}На мгновение вам кажется, что сержант вот-вот ответит "...кто там?", после чего — почему-то вы знаете это точно — с ним случится нечто поистине ужасное. Но, сцепив челюсти, солдат отвечает вам лишь негодующим взглядом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}For a brief moment you feel the sergeant is about to reply '...who is there?', which would be followed by him suffering a most terrible fate. Somehow you know this for certain, but he just clenches his jaw and shoots you an indignant glare instead.{/n}

{n}For a brief moment you feel the sergeant is about to reply '...who is there?', which would be followed by him suffering a most terrible fate. Somehow you know this for certain, but he just clenches his jaw and shoots you an indignant glare instead.{/n}

{n}For a brief moment, you feel the sergeant is about to reply "...who is there?", which would be followed by him suffering the grisliest fate. Somehow you know this for certain, but he just clenches his jaw and shoots you an indignant glare instead.{/n}

{n}For a brief moment, you feel the sergeant is about to reply "...who is there?", which would be followed by him suffering the grisliest fate. Somehow you know this for certain, but he just clenches his jaw and shoots you an indignant glare instead.{/n}

{n}For a brief moment, you sense that the sergeant is about to reply, "Who's there?", followed by him suffering the grisliest of fates. Somehow you know this for certain, but he just clenches his jaw and shoots you an indignant glare instead.{/n}

{n}For a brief moment, you sense that the sergeant is about to reply, "Who's there?", followed by him suffering the grisliest of fates. Somehow you know this for certain, but he just clenches his jaw and shoots you an indignant glare instead.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'espace d'un instant, vous avez l'impression que le sergent va demander « Qui est là ? », après quoi il connaîtra le plus sinistre des destins. Cependant, il se contente de serrer la mâchoire et de vous lancer un regard indigné.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a brief moment, you sense that the sergeant is about to reply, "Who's there?", followed by him suffering the grisliest of fates. Somehow you know this for certain, but he just clenches his jaw and shoots you an indignant glare instead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'espace d'un instant, vous êtes {mf|persuadé|persuadée} que le sergent va demander « Qui est là ? », après quoi il connaîtra le plus sinistre des destins. Cependant, il se contente de serrer la mâchoire et de vous lancer un regard indigné.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Por un instante, tienes la sensación de que el sargento está a punto de responder «... ¿Quién es?», lo que le llevaría a sufrir el peor destino imaginable. Eres totalmente consciente de ello, pero, aun así, aprieta la mandíbula y te lanza una mirada desafiante.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a brief moment, you sense that the sergeant is about to reply, "Who's there?", followed by him suffering the grisliest of fates. Somehow you know this for certain, but he just clenches his jaw and shoots you an indignant glare instead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Por un instante, sientes que el sargento está a punto de responder «... ¿Quién es?», lo que le llevaría a sufrir el peor destino imaginable. Eres totalmente consciente de ello, pero, aun así, aprieta la mandíbula y te lanza una mirada desafiante.{/n}

languages.text: {n}有那么一瞬间，你感觉那个军士似乎想要接话“……把门开开”，可如果他真的打开了能量场，恐怕就会遭受最为凄惨的命运。不知为何，你觉得那个军士就是这么想的，但他仅仅是咬紧牙关，愤怒地瞪了你一眼。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a brief moment, you sense that the sergeant is about to reply, "Who's there?", followed by him suffering the grisliest of fates. Somehow you know this for certain, but he just clenches his jaw and shoots you an indignant glare instead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}有那么一瞬间，你觉得那个军士似乎想要接话“……把门开开”，可如果他真的打开了能量场，恐怕就会遭受最为凄惨的命运。不知为何，你觉得那个军士就是这么想的，但他仅仅是咬紧牙关，愤怒地瞪了你一眼。{/n}

languages.text: {n}一瞬、あなたは軍曹が「…そこにいるのは誰だ？」と答えようとしているのを感じた。それは、彼に最も悲惨な運命を辿らせることになるだろう。なぜかあなたはそのことを確信していたが、彼は顎をしゃくって、代わりに憤怒のまなざしをあなたに向けるだけだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a brief moment, you sense that the sergeant is about to reply, "Who's there?", followed by him suffering the grisliest of fates. Somehow you know this for certain, but he just clenches his jaw and shoots you an indignant glare instead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一瞬、あなたは軍曹が「…そこにいるのは誰だ？」と答えようとしているのを感じた。それは、彼に最も悲惨な運命を辿らせることになるだろう。なぜかあなたはそのことを確信していたが、彼は顎をしゃくって、代わりに憤怒のまなざしをあなたに向けるだけだった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Einen kurzen Augenblick lang glaubst du, der Sergeant würde antworten: "Wer ist da?" Was sein Todesurteil wäre. Du bist durch und durch überzeugt davon, doch er beißt einfach nur die Zähne zusammen und starrt dich entrüstet an.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a brief moment, you sense that the sergeant is about to reply, "Who's there?", followed by him suffering the grisliest of fates. Somehow you know this for certain, but he just clenches his jaw and shoots you an indignant glare instead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Einen kurzen Augenblick lang glaubst du, der Sergeant würde antworten: "... wer ist das?" Was sein Todesurteil wäre. Du bist durch und durch überzeugt davon, doch er beißt einfach nur die Zähne zusammen und starrt dich entrüstet an.{/n}
